name: div
features: Tunnel-Belt Loop Waist: Provides a secure & adjustable fit for maximum comfort
Fly Front Closure: Features an extended two-snap closure for a clean, secure look

Double Knit: Lightweight, durable fabric construction designed for long-lasting performance
